    Information about

    We pay a lot of attention to the development of web design. It is not difficult to develop that, but it's really hard to make it high-quality, functional and convenient. Our design corresponds to the profile of the customer, contains elements of corporate symbols. We constantly conduct usability testing, audit of the target audience (CA). In order to the site to be useful to the audience, we determine the target audience of the business, its requests, preferences and interests. It's also helpful to audit a niche, analyze which sites it already has, which sites competitors have. It turns out to be a comprehensive web marketing. This allows you not just increase the traffic to the resource, but also increase the conversion rate so that more visitors become customers.
